SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT b.ORGNZT_NM, a.ESNTL_ID, a.USER_NM, a.EMPL_NO, a.OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY b.ORGNZT_NM, a.USER_NM ASC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_NM, B.SCHDUL_DE, A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, C.USER_NM LEADER_NAME, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE FROM COMTNLEADERSCHDUL A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLEADERSCHDULDE B ON A.SCHDUL_ID = B.SCHDUL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.LEADER_ID = C.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1
AND (#searchMonth# = SUBSTR(B.SCHDUL_DE, 1, 6) )
AND (B.SCHDUL_DE >= #searchBgnDe# AND B.SCHDUL_DE <= #searchEndDe#)
AND (#searchDay# = B.SCHDUL_DE)
AND SCHDUL_SE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
AND C.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeywordEx#||'%'
ORDER BY SCHDUL_BGNDE

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, D.SCHDUL_DE, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.LEADER_ID, B.USER_NM LEADER_NAME, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE, A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, C.USER_NM SCHDUL_CHARGER_NAME, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNLEADERSCHDUL A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.LEADER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLEADERSCHDULDE D ON A.SCHDUL_ID = D.SCHDUL_ID WHERE A.SCHDUL_ID = #schdulId# AND D.SCHDUL_DE = #schdulDe#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNLEADERSCHDUL SET SCHDUL_SE=#schdulSe#, SCHDUL_NM=#schdulNm#, SCHDUL_CN=#schdulCn#, SCHDUL_PLACE=#schdulPlace#, LEADER_ID=#leaderId#, REPTIT_SE_CODE=#reptitSeCode#, SCHDUL_BGNDE=#schdulBgnDe#, SCHDUL_ENDDE=#schdulEndDe#, SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID=#schdulChargerId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE SCHDUL_ID = #schdulId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNLEADERSCHDUL ( SCHDUL_ID, SCHDUL_SE, SCHDUL_NM, SCHDUL_CN, SCHDUL_PLACE, LEADER_ID, REPTIT_SE_CODE, SCHDUL_BGNDE, SCHDUL_ENDDE, SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #schdulId#, #schdulSe#, #schdulNm#, #schdulCn#, #schdulPlace#, #leaderId#, #reptitSeCode#, #schdulBgnDe#, #schdulEndDe#, #schdulChargerId#, sysdate, #frstRegisterId#, sysdate, #lastUpdusrId# )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.LEADER_ID, B.USER_NM LEADER_NM, D.ORGNZT_NM, E.CODE_NM LEADER_STTUS_NM, C.USER_NM LAST_UPDUSR_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNLEADERSTTUS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.LEADER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO D ON B.ORGNZT_ID = D.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE E ON E.CODE_ID = 'COM061' AND A.LEADER_STTUS = E.CODE WHERE 1=1
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
D.CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
ORDER BY B.USER_NM ASC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.LEADER_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNLEADERSTTUS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.LEADER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON D.CODE_ID = 'COM061' AND A.LEADER_STTUS = D.CODE WHERE 1=1
B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'
D.CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchWrd#||'%'

SELECT A.LEADER_ID, B.USER_NM LEADER_NM, C.ORGNZT_NM, A.LEADER_STTUS, D.CODE_NM LEADER_STTUS_NM FROM COMTNLEADERSTTUS A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.LEADER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO C ON B.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON D.CODE_ID = 'COM061' AND A.LEADER_STTUS = D.CODE WHERE A.LEADER_ID = #leaderId#
